statements: SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM itineraries WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT itinerary_id, destination, activities FROM itineraries WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(activities) > 3;
SELECT * FROM itineraries ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM itineraries WHERE end_date < '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE start_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT destination, start_date FROM itineraries WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT itinerary_id, destination, end_date FROM itineraries ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Itinerary
SELECT destination, travel_date FROM Itinerary
SELECT itinerary_id, destination, travel_date FROM Itinerary WHERE travel_date >= '2021-10-10'
SELECT * FROM Activity
SELECT activity_name, location FROM Activity
SELECT * FROM Itinerary WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT activity_name, location FROM Activity WHERE activity_type = 'Adventure' ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT MAX(activity_id) FROM Activity;
SELECT DISTINCT destination FROM Itinerary;
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT name, location FROM destinations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT activity_name FROM activities WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT destination_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM itineraries GROUP BY destination_id ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM destinations WHERE location = 'Beach';
SELECT destination_id, date, activities FROM itineraries ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, description FROM activities WHERE activity_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM destinations INNER JOIN itineraries ON destinations.id = itineraries.destination_id;
SELECT name, country, city FROM Destinations;
SELECT * FROM Destinations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT destination_id, name, country FROM Destinations ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT * FROM Dates WHERE duration > 5;
SELECT name, type FROM Activities WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Destinations WHERE country = 'France' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, city FROM Destinations WHERE city = 'Paris' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(duration) AS longest_duration FROM Dates WHERE destination_id = 2;
SELECT name, type FROM Activities WHERE destination_id = 3 AND date_id = 5 ORDER BY type DESC;
SELECT destination_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM Activities GROUP BY destination_id HAVING total_activities > 3;
SELECT * FROM Destinations WHERE country = 'France';
SELECT destination_name, country FROM Destinations ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
